response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet your specific needs and expectations. I understand its significance to you and would like to extend a special offer.

To make this acquisition more accessible, I propose a negotiation process to determine a mutually beneficial price. My initial offer is $1,200,000. Should you find this proposal appealing, please let me know so we can proceed with further discussions. If you require additional information or have any questions, I am here to assist you.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
